items.title: Shining A Light On Shadow AI
items.description: Shadow AI (like most forms of shadow technology and bring your own device activity) is viewed as a negative, an infringement and a risk.

items.title: See Venus At Its Best As The ‘Morning Star’ Peaks This Week
items.description: On July 8, Venus shines as the "Morning Star," reaching its peak in the east-northeast sky. Look 30 mins before sunrisefor the best view.

items.title: Google Starts Checking If Your PC Can Switch To Windows 11
items.description: All Windows 10 users should now upgrade if they can.

items.title: In The AI Revolution, Medical Schools Are Falling Behind U.S. Colleges
items.description: A recent study found that only 14% of medical schools have developed a formal GenAI curriculum compared with 60% of undergraduate programs.

items.title: See A Full ‘Buck Moon’ And Venus Rise As Jupiter Returns: The Night Sky This Week
items.description: Each Monday, I pick out North America’s celestial highlights for the week ahead (which also apply to mid-northern latitudes in the Northern Hemisphere...
